detailedSolution:
The set of lions is a subset of the universal set of cats. In other words, the Venn diagram depicts the relationship that all lions are cats. This is expressed symbolically as <math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><semantics><mrow>
  <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
    <mi>L</mi>
  </mrow>
  <mo>⊂<!-- ⊂ --></mo>
  <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
    <mi>U</mi>
  </mrow>
</mrow><annotation encoding="LaTeX">{L} \subset {U}</annotation></semantics></math>.
